title: Piri Piri Pork Belly | Jamie Oliver
description:
Impress for less with this melt in the mouth Piri Piri Pork Belly Recipe complete with perfectly crisp crackling.  A bay leaf and paprika oil infuses the meat with incredible flavour and chunks of sweet potato, chilli, garlic and passata forms a punchy Piri Piri sauce.  Cooked low and slow and topped with rosemary this tender meat is best served with rice and a simple chopped salad.

This recipe was first aired in 2014 on Ch4 as part of Jamieâ€™s Money Saving Meals series.
